ii. The Policy may be cancelled by You by giving notice to Us in writing provided no claim has arisen during the Period of Insurance.

   a) Monthly Premium Payment - There will be no refund on the premium paid. Your Policy will continue to provide coverage up to the next date in which Your premium is due.

   b) Annual Premium Payment - You shall be entitled to a return of premium subject to the short period rates for the period the Policy has been in force as follows:
